summary: Android movie streaming app called CineVerse with dark cinematic UI, featuring trending movies, categories, AI recommendations, movie details, search, watchlist, continue watching, kids mode, and user profiles
architectural_notes: Dark cinematic UI theme with glassmorphism and minimal design
Netflix/Disney+ style OTT platform interface with rounded cards
Mobile-first Android layout with smooth animations and micro-interactions
Sample movie data included for demonstration
Navigation flow: Splash → Home → Categories/Search/Movie Details → Profile

existing_features.title: Create a splash screen that displays on app launch with the CineVerse branding
Build a home screen with a trending movies carousel banner at the top that auto-rotates through featured movies
Display movie category sections on the home screen for Action, Comedy, Kids, Bollywood, and Hollywood with horizontal scrollable movie cards
Create an AI recommendation section on the home screen that suggests movies based on user interests
Build a movie detail page that displays movie poster, trailer preview player, rating, cast list, description, and a watch button
Implement a search bar with smart suggestions that appears when users start typing movie titles or keywords
Create a watchlist feature where users can add and remove movies to watch later
Build a Continue Watching section that tracks partially watched movies and displays them for easy resume
Create a Kids Mode with a colorful, safe interface that filters content appropriate for children
Build user login and signup flows with authentication and profile creation
Create a profile page that displays user information, preferences, and settings options
Create a categories page that allows users to browse all available movie categories
Implement navigation flow that allows users to move between Splash Screen, Home, Categories, Movie Details, Search, and Profile pages
Apply a dark cinematic UI theme with minimal premium OTT styling, smooth animations, rounded cards, modern fonts, and mobile-first layout optimized for Android devices
